titles.title: A bill to continue until January 1, 1995, the suspension of duty on o-Benzl-p-chlorophenol.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2429)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to continue, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on o-Benzyl-p-chlorophenol.
